db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates how to render a simple skinning animation in Qt Quick 3D.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += quick quick3d
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quick3d/skinning INSTALLS += target
CONFIG += qmltypes QML_IMPORT_NAME = Example QML_IMPORT_MAJOR_VERSION = 1
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ skingeometry.cpp
RESOURCES += \ qml.qrc
OTHER_FILES += \ main.qml
HEADERS += \ skingeometry.h
OTHER_FILES += \ doc/src/*.*
